name: Boroc Invasion
description:
Boroc Invasion Is a Puzzle game heavily inspired by a mobile game called Hitman go. In our game you play as an augmented soldier trying to save the world from a robot invasion by infiltrating an abandoned facility, and eliminating the robot Master mind Boroc who is currently taking shelter in the facility.

There are 8 Rooms within the facility, each with its own challenges. Levels are often filled with deadly robots. The hopper robot that bites anyone that gets too close,And the buzzing Robot that is constantly Patrolling around looking for introducers. Both robots are highly susceptible to noise distractions.
